ActionBar_NewProductCmd.Title: New Product
ActionBar_NewProductCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new product in the structure or standalone
ActionBar_NewProductCmd.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, type a Title and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master then click on Create and Close for a single creation, or click on Create to continue creating products.

If you initially select one or several products, the new product is added as a child.
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.Title: New Part
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new part in the structure or standalone.
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, type a Title and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master then click on Create and Close for a single creation, or click on Create to continue creating parts.

If you initially select one or several products, the new part is added as a child
ActionBar_NewDrawingCmd.Title: New Drawing
ActionBar_NewDrawingCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new drawing in the structure or standalone
ActionBar_NewDrawingCmd.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, type a Title and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master then click on Create and Close for a single creation, or click on Create to continue creating products.

If you initially select one or several products, the new drawing is added as a child.
ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.Title: Access Rights
ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.ShortHelp: Manages the access rights to selected objects.
ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.LongHelp:
Search and select objects, and then click the command.

You can:

  • Modify the access rights for a user: Select a value from the list.
  • Grant access rights to a user: Search and select it, select the access rights, and click Add.
  • Remove a user from the list: Click Remove user.
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.Title: Transfer Ownership
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.ShortHelp: Transfers the ownership of the selected object to another user, in the same or different collaborative space and/or organization.
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.LongHelp:
Select the object you want to transfer and click the command.

In the dialog box, search for a user, and select it.

In the Propagation Option section, select whether you want to transfer the reference, the instance, or both.
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.Title: Reserve
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.ShortHelp: Prevents other users from saving modifications to the selected objects.
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.LongHelp:
Select one or more objects and click the command.

Reference option reserves the Reference object selected. Instance option reserves the parent instance of that Reference.
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.Title: Unreserve
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.ShortHelp: Reverses reserve operation, which allows users to save modification to the selected objects..
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.LongHelp:
Select one or more objects and click the command.

Reference option unreserves the Reference object selected. Instance option unreserves the parent instance of that reference.
SubscribeHdr.Title: Subscribe
SubscribeHdr.LongHelp: Subscribes to events on the selected content.
UnSubscribeHdr.Title: Unsubscribe
UnSubscribeHdr.LongHelp: Cancels subscription to events for selected content.
EditSubscribeHdr.Title: Edit Subscriptions
EditSubscribeHdr.LongHelp: Edits subscription to events for selected content.
MySubscriptionsHdr.Title: My Subscriptions
ActionBar_Attributes.Title: Edit properties
ActionBar_Attributes.LongHelp: Edits the properties of the selected objects
